text: Calogero Lo Giudice (died 24 August 2021) was an Italian politician. He was President of Sicily from 1982 until 1983. Lo Giudice was a Member of the European Parliament from 1989 until 1994. He was a member of the Christian Democracy. Lo Giudice died on 24 August 2021 at the age of 83. ==References== Category:1930s births Category:2021 deaths Category:MEPs for Italy Category:Politicians from Sicily
title: Calogero Lo Giudice
